info.name: ACCA LMS API
info.description:
Complete API collection for ACCA LMS (Learning Management System) backend.

## Authentication
This API uses Bearer token authentication. After login or register, use the returned `token` in the Authorization header:
```
Authorization: Bearer <your_token>
```

## Base URL
Default: `http://localhost:3333`

## Route Groups
- **Auth**: Registration, login, logout, and user info
- **Public**: Publicly accessible courses, CMS content, testimonials, instructors
- **Student**: Authenticated student routes for enrolled courses and lessons
- **Admin**: Admin-only routes for managing all resources
